reviewText: Just what I wanted.  Fast and prompt delivery as promised!  Thanks!

I got on the the very day they said after I do my cooking ill get to watch it and I'm ordering another as  it will be warn out in no time. Robyn who stars in it she later went on to General Hospital . Don Johnston  Nick Nolte all 3 were reall y good in the movie . I like the music in it as will .

It was bought for a gift. The person I bought it for loved it. He hadn't seen it since he was a teen.

I for one was thrilled to finally get this movie on dvd.  It's not an Oscar winner by any means but it is a lot of fun.  The main reason I'm writing this review, however, is to disagree with the previous comments posted here: There IS an English language soundtrack on this disc, you just have to select it from the menu, otherwise it defaults to Spanish.

I did not realize it was NON_USA Format, so icould not watch it. My Fault. Gave it tp a spanish speaking friend.

Are English copies available?

As a car buff, I collect all car related DVD's. My VHS is worn out.
This Movie Needs to be on DVD\Blueray!!!!!!!

All i can say is make sure you read carefully everything about what you order. Amazon is a great place to order from..but i didn't click to read that the dvd was spanish..but why would i worry if it was spanish...i do live in the USA..English is what we use..but it was my fault..because it was listed that it was spanish. Not complaining about service..just venting...
I would like to see this movie come out on DVD.I saw it way back when, wished it was on dvd. I think it would be a great seller if it was, I know I would buy it in a heartbeat. Thanks, Rich!!!
